widget.name: WebViewer
widget.description: Apryse WebViewer is a pure client-side JavaScript library that lets you view, edit, and annotate documents and images right in your Mendix application: Apryse WebViewer is the Mendix integration of Apryse's industry-leading document SDK.

property.caption: URL
property.description: Manually specify a URL to load from.

property.caption: File
property.description: A FileDocument type of entity.

property.caption: Show file picker
property.description: Allow users to load their own local files.

property.caption: Load as PDF
property.description: Converts the loaded document to PDF after loading.

property.caption: Enable Office editing
property.description: Switches WebViewer to Office editing.

property.caption: Enable full API
property.description: Loads the full API for full document processing features. This can impact performance compared to the lean API. Only turn this on if you need it.

property.caption: User
property.description: Name of the user for annotations. Default is 'Guest'.

property.caption: Enable annotations
property.description: Enable annotating documents.

property.caption: Enable measurement
property.description: Enable measurement tools.

property.caption: Enable redaction
property.description: Enable the ability to redact content. The full API is required to apply the redactions.

property.caption: Select on creation
property.description: Automatically select annotations when they are created.

property.caption: XFDF Attribute
property.description: The XFDF attribute to import from and export to.

property.caption: On export XFDF
property.description: Trigger an action when exporting annotations to XFDF. This can occur many times when auto-export is enabled.

property.caption: Enable XFDF Export Button
property.description: Enable the button to manually export and save annotations as XFDF.

property.caption: Enable Auto XFDF Export
property.description: Enable automatic saving of the annotation XFDF when annotations change.

property.caption: Enable Auto XFDF Import
property.description: Enable automatic importing of the annotation XFDF when the document loads. Occurs only once on document load.

property.caption: Is visible
property.description: A flag to toggle the visibility of WebViewer without unmounting it.

property.caption: Container height
property.description: The height of the container, in CSS, that WebViewer mounts to. Ultimately, the height of WebViewer as well.

property.caption: Enable dark mode
property.description: Changes to the dark theme.

property.caption: Notes in left panel
property.description: Moves the notes panel from the right to the left.

property.caption: Enabled elements
property.description: A list of elements (written on individual lines) to enable in the UI. You can find values in the UI using the data-element attribute. Takes priority over disabled elements.

property.caption: Disabled elements
property.description: A list of elements (written on individual lines) to disable in the UI. You can find values in the UI using the data-element attribute.

property.caption: Custom CSS
property.description: Provide a path to your own CSS to customize styling.

property.caption: Enable accessibility mode
property.description: Enable accessibility features. E.g tab page selection and page text in the DOM.

property.caption: Enable high contrast mode
property.description: Enable high contrast colors to help with accessibility.

property.caption: Enable document updates
property.description: Adds a button to the header to allow updating the document on the server (annotations, links, widgets). Requires WebViewer module.

property.caption: Enable save as
property.description: Adds a button to the header to allow saving a document to the server as a new file. Requires WebViewer module.

property.caption: Enable Real-time Annotating
property.description: Annotate in real-time with other users without an additional server. This will make polling requests.

property.caption: On export XFDF command
property.description: Trigger an action when exporting annotations to XFDF commands. This can occur multiple files.

property.caption: Auto Import Interval
property.description: The interval in milliseconds to get XFDF updates from the server for the current file.

property.caption: Key
property.description: WebViewer license key. Please reach out to sales@apryse.com for more information.
